content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Semantic elements = elements with a meaning. Provide the user a good way to navigate and interact with your site. Make your HTML semantic. Semantics is about using the correct element in HTML. There are approximately 110 elements in HTML 5. Two of them have no meaning –
and . They tell us nothing about the content. They have no built in accessibility features, so we should always check to see if any other elements are better suited. Example of semantic elements:
